main event: A pilot observed a dark object with an orange flame following it for 5 seconds over Elmendorf AFB, Alaska on October 28, 1955.
interesting points: The object had an indefinite outline and emitted no sound,The tail of the object was initially seven times the length of the object but reduced to the same size within 2 seconds,Visibility was clear with no clouds in the area during the sighting,The pilot concluded it resembled a meteor but noted it seemed close to his aircraft,There were no radar detections of the object despite the clear conditions.
sighted object: a dark object with an orange flame
